text: Nena: “Kodi ine nditenge wina aliyense osati Mulungu kuti akhale Mtetezi wanga, Mlengi wakumwamba ndi dziko lapansi? Iye ndiye amene amadyetsa pamene Iye sadyetsedwa.” Nena: “Ndithudi ine ndalamulidwa kukhala woyamba wa anthu ogonjera kwa Mulungu.” Iwe usadzakhale mmodzi wa iwo amene amapembedza mafano
